contest-event.event-date: Nov. 9, 1985 D National Mineworkers (Fourth Section) National Mineworkers (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest National Mineworkers Contest national-mineworkers-fourth-section This contest became the Butlins Mineworkers Contest in 2003. Fourth The Isle of Avalon Winter Gardens (Pavilion Theatre), Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK Prizes 1st £175, 2nd £150, 3rd £125, 4th £100, 5th £75, 6th £50. 13 bands competed. 23rd annual contest Dec. 23, 2011, 3:32 p.m. June 14, 2020, 11:18 a.m. 1 Snibston - Desford Mick Garratt 2 Ireland Colliery Band Francis Evans 3 GT Group Peterlee Stan MacDonald 4 Allerton Bywater Colliery K.
